Steps:
1. open the launch dialog
2. select the last launch configuration type in the listing
3. open the filtering prefs and filter the selected type
4. close the filtering pref page....BOOM you get the exception.

fixed in HEAD

see LaunchConfigurationViewer

please verify Curtis W
